branchCategory.name: NCQ8
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's NCQ8 series is a square body, compact interchange type cylinder that allows close center to center mounting.&nbsp; Mounting of the auto switch is easy and is mountable on multi-sides. Use of the retaining ring method improves maintenance performance. Replacing seals is easily obtained by removing the collar. </p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)Q8, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's double acting, single rod version of the NCQ8 series is a square body, compact interchange type cylinder that allows close center to center mounting.  Mounting of the auto switch is easy and is mountable on multi-sides. Use of the retaining ring method improves maintenance performance. Replacing seals is easily obtained by removing the collar. </p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)Q8, Compact Cylinder, Single Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's single acting, single rod version of the NCQ8 series is a square body, compact interchange type cylinder that allows close center to center mounting.  Mounting of the auto switch is easy and is mountable on multi-sides. Use of the retaining ring method improves maintenance performance. Replacing seals is easily obtained by removing the collar.</p>

branchItem.name: NC(D)Q8W, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>SMC's double acting, double rod version of the NCQ8 series is a square body, compact interchange type cylinder that allows close center to center mounting.  Mounting of the auto switch is easy and is mountable on multi-sides. Use of the retaining ring method improves maintenance performance. Replacing seals is easily obtained by removing the collar.</p>
